description.english: Finish a destroy the object level without killing an enemy.
description.spanish: Termina un nivel de Destruye El Objetivo sin asesinar a ningun enemigo.
description.german: Bewältige ein 'Objekt zerstören'-Level, ohne einen Feind auszuschalten.
description.french: Termine un niveau Détruire l'objet sans tuer un seul ennemi.
description.japanese: 敵を倒さずに障害物を壊すレベルをクリアする。
description.koreana: 적을 쓰러뜨리지 않고 장애물을 파괴하는 스테이지를 클리어한다.
description.schinese: 在未杀死任何敌人的状况下完成“摧毁目标”任务。
description.italian: Finisci un livello 'Distruggi l'oggetto' senza uccidere alcun nemico.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma fase Destruir o Objeto sem matar um inimigo.
description.russian: Пройди уровень Уничтожить цель, не убив ни одного врага.

description.english: Play single player campaign mode and reach level 10. Defeat Blockbeard to unlock this achievement.
description.spanish: Juega el modo campaña. Derrota a Blockbeard para desbloquear este logro.
description.german: Besiege den ersten Boss in der Piratenwelt.
description.french: Tu dois vaincre le premier boss du thème des pirates.
description.japanese: 海賊テーマの最初のボスを倒す。
description.koreana: 해적 테마의 첫 번째 보스를 쓰러뜨린다.
description.schinese: 打败海盗主题中的第一魔王。
description.italian: Sconfiggi il primo boss nel tema dei pirati.
description.brazilian: Derrote o primeiro chefe no tema de Piratas.
description.russian: Победи первого босса пиратской серии.

displayName.japanese: 君の瞳は百万ブロック

description.english: Destroy a total of 1.000.000 blocks. All blocks you destroyed from all levels are counted.
description.spanish: Destruye 1.000.000 de bloques. Cuentan todos los bloques de todos los niveles.
description.german: Zerstöre 1.000.000 Blöcke.
description.french: Détruis 1 000 000 de blocs.
description.japanese: ブロックを1,000,000個破壊する。
description.italian: Distruggi 1.000.000 blocchi.
description.brazilian: Destrua 1.000.000 de blocos.
description.russian: Уничтожь 1 000 000 блоков.

displayName.english: I'll Show You Fits Of Rage
displayName.spanish: Te mostraré mi puño de acero
displayName.german: Ich zeige dir, was Wut ist

description.english: In any level, online or offline, kill 20 enemies within one minute to unlock this achievement.
description.spanish: En cualquier nivel, online/offline, mata a 20 enemigos en 60 segundos.
description.german: Vernichte 20 Gegner in 60 Sekunden.
description.french: Tire sur 20 ennemis en 60 secondes.
description.japanese: ６０秒以内に敵を２０体倒す。
description.schinese: 在六十秒内射中二十个敌人。
description.italian: Spara a 20 nemici in 60 secondi.
description.brazilian: Acerte 20 inimigos em 60 segundos.
description.russian: Пристрели 20 врагов за 60 секунд.

displayName.english: You're Like Some Kind Of Robot
displayName.german: Du hast was von einem Roboter
displayName.japanese: まるでロボットみたいだな
displayName.italian: Sei come una specie di robot
displayName.brazilian: Você é Um Tipo de Robô

description.english: Kill a total of 50 enemies with a longshot. All longshots through the entire game are counted.
description.spanish: Mata a un total de 50 enemigos con tiros largos. Cuentan todos los tiros largos en el juego.
description.german: Erziele 50 Weitschüsse.
description.french: Exécute 50 longs tirs.
description.japanese: ロングショットで敵を５０体倒す。
description.schinese: 远射50发。
description.italian: Esegui 50 tiri lunghi.
description.brazilian: Obtenha 50 tiros de longo alcance.
description.russian: Сделай 50 дальних выстрелов.

description.english: Use all 20 power-ups in the game, including the red power-downs. The tutorial level doesn't count.
description.spanish: Utiliza todos los poderes al menos una vez.
description.german: Benutze jedes Powerup mindestens einmal.
description.french: Utilise tous les pouvoirs au moins une fois.
description.japanese: 全てのパワーアップを少なくとも１回使う。
description.koreana: 모든 파워업을 적어도 한 번 사용한다.
description.schinese: 每一种能量补充方式至少使用一次。
description.italian: Usa ogni potenziamento almeno una volta.
description.brazilian: Use cada item especial pelo menos uma vez.
description.russian: Используй каждый модификатор хотя бы раз.

description.english: Play through all 80 single player levels successfully to unlock this achievement.
description.spanish: Termina los niveles de la campaña para desbloquear este logro.
description.german: Schließ die Einzelspieler-Kampagne ab.
description.french: Termine la campagne en solo.
description.japanese: シングルプレーヤーモードをクリアする。
description.schinese: 完成单人征战。
description.italian: Finisci la campagna giocatore singolo.
description.brazilian: Termine a campanha single player.
description.russian: Пройди одиночную кампанию.

displayName.spanish: En la dieta de un jugador
displayName.japanese: ゲーマーダイエット中

description.english: Shoot 50 zombies, 50 robots, 50 pirates and 50 soldiers. All levels online and offline count.
description.spanish: Dispara a 50 zombis, 50 robots, 50 piratas y a 50 soldados.
description.german: Schieße 50 Zombies, 50 Roboter, 50 Piraten und 50 Soldaten ab.
description.french: Tire sur 50 zombies, 50 robots, 50 pirates et 50 soldats.
description.japanese: ゾンビを５０体、ロボットを５０体、海賊を５０体、兵士を５０体倒す。
description.schinese: 射中僵尸，机器人，海盗，士兵各50个。
description.italian: Spara a 50 zombie, 50 robot, 50 pirati e 50 soldati.
description.brazilian: Acerte 50 zumbis, 50 robôs, 50 piratas e 50 soldados.
description.russian: Пристрели 50 зомби, 50 роботов, 50 пиратов и 50 солдат.

description.english: Kill 5000 enemies throughout the game to unlock this achievements.
description.spanish: Mata a 5.000 enemigos en total.
description.german: Schieße insgesamt 5000 Gegner ab.
description.french: Tire sur un total de 5 000 ennemis.
description.japanese: 合計で敵を５０００体倒す。
description.schinese: 总计射中5000个敌人。
description.italian: Spara a 5.000 nemici in totale.
description.brazilian: Acerte 5.000 inimigos no total.
description.russian: Пристрели в сумме 5000 врагов.

displayName.japanese: 今までに見てきたものたち

description.english: Kill all different types of enemies in Rocket Riot to unlock this achievement.
description.spanish: Dispara a todos los tipos de enemigos al menos una vez.
description.german: Erledige jeden Gegnertyp mindestens einmal.
description.french: Tire sur tous les types d'ennemis au moins une fois.
description.japanese: 全種類の敵を最低1回は倒す。
description.schinese: 每种敌人至少射中1次。
description.italian: Spara a ogni tipo di nemico almeno una volta.
description.brazilian: Atire em cada tipo de inimigo pelo menos uma vez.
description.russian: Пристрели хотя бы по одному врагу каждого типа.

description.english: Die while fighting BlockBeard on the final level.
description.spanish: Muere peleando contra Barbabloque en el último nivel.
description.german: Bekämpfe den Endboss und scheitere grandios!
description.french: Affronte le boss final et échoue lamentablement.
description.japanese: ラスボスにコテンパンにされる。
description.schinese: 挑战最终魔王时被杀的片甲不留。
description.italian: Combatti con il boss finale e muori miseramente.
description.brazilian: Lute com o último chefe e seja derrotado.
description.russian: Позорно проиграй финальному боссу.

displayName.brazilian: Um Tiro, o Triplo da Pontuação

description.english: Kill 3 enemies with one shot.
description.spanish: Mata a 3 enemigos con un disparo.
description.german: Töte 3 Gegner mit einem Schuss.
description.french: Tu dois tuer 3 ennemis en un coup.
description.japanese: ワンショットで敵を３キルする。
description.schinese: 一发击毙3个敌人。
description.italian: Uccidi 3 nemici con un colpo.
description.brazilian: Mate 3 inimigos com um só tiro.
description.russian: Убей 3 врагов одним выстрелом.

displayName.german: Der braucht nur eine nette Umarmung!
displayName.japanese: 抱きしめて欲しいだけ！
displayName.schinese: 他其实只想要一个拥抱而已！

description.english: Make a giant Strongman miniboss follow you around for 20 seconds.
description.spanish: Consigue que un minijefe fortachón te siga durante 20 segundos.
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass ein riesiger Strongman-Miniboss dir 20 Sekunden lang folgt.
description.french: Laisse-toi poursuivre par un miniboss colosse pendant 20 secondes.
description.japanese: ミニボスの巨大ストロングマンを2０秒間引きつける。
description.koreana: 자이언트 스트롱맨 미니보스가 플레이어를 20초 동안 따라오게 한다.
description.schinese: 令巨型大力士小魔王跟随你 20 秒。
description.italian: Fatti inseguire da un miniboss Forzuto gigante per 20 secondi.
description.brazilian: Faça um minichefe Strongman gigante segui-lo por 20 segundos.
description.russian: Заставить гигантского мини-босса Силача следовать за тобой 20 секунд.

description.english: Defeat a 1,000 donuts in the Dream World pack.
description.spanish: Derrota a 1000 rosquillas en Dreamworld.
description.german: Besiege 1000 Donuts im Paket
description.french: Bats 1 000 donuts dans le pack Dream World.
description.japanese: ドリームワールドパックで１０００個のドーナツを倒す。
description.schinese: 在迪林伍德外传中击败 1000 个甜甜圈。
description.italian: Sconfiggi 1.000 ciambelle nel pacchetto Dream World.
description.brazilian: Derrote 1000 donuts no pacote Dream World.
description.russian: Победить 1000 пончиков в наборе Мир снов.

displayName.japanese: ケチャップを放さないで！

description.english: Don't destroy ANY ketchup!
description.german: Zerstöre KEINEN Ketchup!
description.french: Ne détruis AUCUN bloc de ketchup !
description.italian: Non distruggere NESSUN ketchup!
description.spanish: No destruyas NINGÚN kétchup!
description.schinese: 不要摧毁任何蕃茄酱！
description.russian: Не разбить НИ ОДНОГО кетчупа!
description.japanese: ケチャップを一つも壊さない！
description.brazilian: Não destrua NENHUM catchup!

description.english: Defeat the final boss in the Dream World pack.
description.german: Besiege den letzten Boss im Paket 'Dream World'.
description.french: Bats le boss final dans le pack Dream World.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il boss finale del pacchetto Dream World.
description.koreana: 드림 월드 팩에서 마지막 보스를 쓰러뜨린다.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe final de Dreamworld.
description.schinese: 打败迪林伍德外传的终极魔王。
description.japanese: ドリームワールドパックの最後のボスを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote o último chefe do pacote Dream World.
description.russian: Убить последнего босса в наборе Мир снов.

description.english: Have every pixel in a level from the Arts & Crafts pack destroyed at the same time.
description.spanish: Destruye todos los píxeles de un nivel de Arts & Crafts a la vez.
description.german: Zerstöre alle Pixel in einem Level des Pakets Arts and Crafts
description.french: Détruis tous les pixels d'un niveau en même temps dans le pack Arts and Crafts.
description.japanese: アートアンドクラフトパックのステージ内で全てのピクセルを同時に壊す。
description.koreana: 아트 앤 크래프트 팩 레벨의 모든 픽셀을 동시에 파괴한다.
description.schinese: 在美术外传中的任何一关同一时间摧毀全部象素。
description.italian: Fai in modo che ogni pixel di un livello del pacchetto Arts and Crafts venga distrutto contemporaneamente.
description.brazilian: Destrua todos os pixels de um nível do pacote Arts and Crafts ao mesmo tempo.
description.russian: Одновременно уничтожить все пиксели на одном из уровней набора Искусства и ремесла.

displayName.french: Drôle de poisson, tu es génial !
displayName.japanese: デープフィッシュは最高！
displayName.schinese: 喔喔，特尔普鱼，你真厉害！
displayName.brazilian: Oh, Derpfish, você é tão incrível!

description.english: Finish every level in the Arts & Crafts pack playing as Derpfish.
description.spanish: Completa cada nivel de Arts & Crafts pack jugando como Derpfish.
description.german: Beende alle Level im Paket
description.french: Termine tous les niveaux du pack Arts and Crafts en incarnant Drôle de poisson.
description.japanese: デープフィッシュでアートアンドクラフトパックの全てのステージをクリアする。
description.koreana: 덥피시로 플레이하여 아트 앤 크래프트 팩의 모든 레벨을 완료한다.
description.schinese: 以特尔普鱼的身份完成美术外传中的所有关卡。
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli del pacchetto Arts and Crafts nei panni di Derpfish.
description.brazilian: Termine todos os níveis do pacote Arts and Crafts jogando como Derpfish.
description.russian: Пройти все уровни в наборе Искусства и ремесла, играя за Дурацкую рыбу.

description.english: Defeat Spartacus while playing as Spartacus.
description.spanish: Derrota a Espartaco jugando como Espartaco.
description.german: Besiege Spartacus, während du Spartacus spielst.
description.french: Bats Spartacus en incarnant Spartacus.
description.japanese: スパルタカスでスパルタカスを倒す。
description.schinese: 以 Spartacus 的身份打败 Spartacus。
description.italian: Sconfiggi Spartacus nei panni di Spartacus.
description.brazilian: Derrote Spartacus jogando como Spartacus.
description.russian: Победить Спартака, играя за Спартака.

displayName.french: Qui c'est qui est protégé maintenant ?

description.english: Shoot 12 bouncy rockets into the Roman encampment.
description.spanish: Dispara 12 cohetes que rebotan en el campamento romano.
description.german: Schieße 12 Sprungraketen in das römische Lager.
description.french: Tire 12 fusées rebondissantes dans le camp romain.
description.japanese: ローマ陣営に12発のバウンスロケットを発射する。
description.schinese: 发射 12 发弹跳火箭到罗马营地去。
description.italian: Spara 12 razzi rimbalzosi nell'accampamento romano.
description.brazilian: Atire 12 foguetes ricocheteantes no acampamento romano.
description.russian: Выпустить 12 пружинящих ракет по лагерю римлян.

displayName.spanish: El hombre que gritaba a los caballos

description.english: Punch the horse to make it explode.
description.spanish: Dale un puñetazo al caballo para hacerlo explotar.
description.german: Hau das Pferd, damit es explodiert.
description.french: Frappe le cheval pour le faire exploser.
description.japanese: 馬をパンチして爆発させる。
description.schinese: 拳击那匹马，让它爆炸。
description.italian: Dai un pugno al cavallo per farlo esplodere.
description.brazilian: Soque o cavalo para fazê-lo explodir.
description.russian: Ударить коня, чтобы он взорвался.

description.english: Defeat all the enemies in the level from inside the zeppelin.
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los enemigos del nivel dentro del Zeppelin.
description.german: Besiege alle Gegner im Level aus dem Zeppelin heraus.
description.french: Bats tous les ennemis du niveau depuis le zeppelin.
description.japanese: ツェッペリン内ステージの全ての敵を倒す。
description.koreana: 제펠린 안에서 레벨의 모든 적을 무찌른다.
description.schinese: 打败齐柏林飞船关中的全部敌人。
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti i nemici del livello dall'interno dello zeppelin.
description.brazilian: Derrote todos os inimigos do nível, de dentro do zepelim.
description.russian: Победить всех врагов на уровне внутри дирижабля.

description.english: Share a screenshot at the end of a Rugby Riot level.
description.spanish: Comparte una captura de pantalla al final de un nivel de Rugby.
description.german: Teile ein Bildschirmfoto am Ende des Levels
description.french: Partage une capture d'écran à la fin d'un niveau Combat de rugby.
description.japanese: ラグビーライオットステージ最後のスクリーンショットをシェアする。
description.koreana: 럭비 라이옷 레벨의 끝에서 스크린샷을 공유한다.
description.schinese: 在榄球暴乱关尾分享截图。
description.italian: Condividi una foto della schermata al termine del livello Rugby ribelle.
description.brazilian: Compartilhe uma foto do fim do nível Rugby Riot.
description.russian: Поделиться скриншотом в конце уровня 'Реактивное регби'.

description.english: Finish a deathmatch level by letting your banana bros defeat all the enemies.
description.spanish: Termina un nivel de combate a muerte dejando que tus hermanos de plátano derroten a todos los enemigos.
description.german: Beende einen Deathmatch-Level, indem deine Bananenkumpel alle Gegner besiegen.
description.french: Termine un niveau Combat à mort en laissant tes frères bananes battre tous les ennemis.
description.japanese: バナナブラザーズに全ての敵を倒させて、デスマッチステージをクリアする。
description.koreana: Bananabro가 적을 모두 무찌르게 하여 데스매치 레벨을 완료한다.
description.schinese: 让你的香蕉兄弟打败全部敌人来完成死斗关卡。
description.italian: Completa un livello deathmatch facendo in modo che tutti i nemici siano sconfitti dai tuoi bananabro.
description.brazilian: Termine uma partida exterminador deixando seus banana bros derrotarem todos os inimigos.
description.russian: Пройти уровень 'Смертный бой', позволив своим бананобратьям победить всех врагов.
